text: @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/Mh4ja5U9kb 150,00 Dead from coronavirus. Great job with the Trump Virus. 2 people died from Ebola under Obama and you were calling for his resignation. Trump is the death president. 200,000 dead by Election Day. Plus America in flames and people in the streets.

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
